benchmark_details.name: AWARE BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: AWARE BENCH is a benchmark designed to evaluate awareness in large language models (LLMs) across five dimensions: capability, mission, emotion, culture, and perspective.
similar_benchmarks: Metatool benchmark for large language models

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate awareness in large language models to ensure ethical integration into societal frameworks.
tasks: Assessing LLMs' understanding of self-awareness and social interactions

data.annotation: Human-AI collaboration in dataset generation and quality evaluation

methodology.calculation: Accuracy calculated as the ratio of correctly answered questions to the total number of questions.
methodology.interpretation: Evaluate LLMs' understanding and adherence to human values in responses.
methodology.baseline_results: Most LLMs scored below 80% accuracy across awareness dimensions.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: All dataset queries drawn from publicly available sources.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: No direct participant involvement apart from researchers.
